p:
Chlorophyll a and b, total chlorophyll, and carotenoids were isolated from fresh leaves using 80% ( v/ v) acetone. After centrifugation (15,000× g for 5 min at 25 °C), the absorbance of the resulting extracts was determined spectrophotometrically at 470, 646 and 663 nm (UV-1800 Shimadzu, Kyoto, Japan) and the concentration of photosynthetic pigments was determined by the following equations from Arnon [ 27]: Chl a = (12.47 × A663) − (3.62 × A 645) (2)
Chl b = (25.06 × A645) − (6.5 × A663) (3)
Carotenoids = (1000 × A470) − (1.29 Chl a − 53.78 Chl b) (4)
